review: We have a very pleasant  economic with Dr.  Ankur Gupta and his staff.My wife was very anxious about the appointment and any procedure  but Dr Gupta was very patient with her and spent a lot of time trying to calm her down.He is very professional  and takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provide valuable advice. I highly recommend Dr. Gupta for my family and friends

I was explained about my teeth cleaning and appropriate time slot was given..
